sections.name: SECTION C - Detailed Answer Question
instructions: Attempt any FOUR questions from this Section.

questions.question: State the law of mass action, apply it on the following reversible reaction: aA + bB ⇌ cC + dD and derive the expression for equilibrium constant.
What do you mean by quantitative analysis? Also define the following terms: (i) error (ii) systematic error (iii) random error (iv) accuracy (v) precision
What are salts? Write down its preparation by action of acid on: (i) metal hydroxide (ii) metal carbonates (iii) metal oxide with representative chemical equation for each.
What are amino acids? Describe the formation of dipeptide through peptide linkage bond between two amino acid units with structural equation.
What are carbohydrates? Classify carbohydrates on the basis of hydrolysis into three types with an example of each also mention the source from where these can be obtained.
